title: Emmerdale spoilers: Moira kills Nate to save Cain's life in Emmerdale?
text:
It’s not the first time that Moira Dingle (Natalie J Robb) has resorted to murder in October so could the Emmerdale favourite be set to kill again as she fears that Nate Robinson (Jurell Carter) will overpower Cain Dingle (Jeff Horldey) and finish him off?

Moira has been pulled into an illicit affair with farmhand Nate and, unable to resist the lust, she has put her marriage on the line. So when Cain discovers the truth this week, lives hang in the balance as he tricks the cheating couple onto a boat trip.

As Cain confronts Nate over what has happened between him and Moira, spiteful Nate delights in going into graphic detail about sleeping with Moira which causes a violent Cain to snap. A fight to the death ensues in dramatic fashion, with Cain having murder in mind.

However, Nate soon proves to be just as much of a force to be reckoned with and he gives Cain a run for his money in the fighting stakes, even overpowering him at one point. Seeing that her husband is in danger of death, will Moira intervene and attack Nate, possibly killing him in order to save Cain? And will Cain help her cover it up if so?

Advertisement

Advertisement

Things are set to get even more terrifying as Moira will end up in the depths of the lake, with her leg caught and tangled in weeds. As she struggles to emerge from the water, a chain of events will see an explosion rip through the boat, meaning everyone on board faces death.

It remains to be seen exactly how the situation plays out but fans have been aching for some redemption for Cain – and for Nate to pay the price for pursuing sex with Moira seemingly just to spite him.

Will Moira deliver the harsh justice that is being demanded?

Advertisement Advertisement
description: Will Moira sacrifice Nate to save Cain?
